SEARCH
Package server.Model

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
Observer.GameModelObservable
server.Model.GameModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, SimpleGameModel
public class GameModel extends GameModelObservable implements Serializable, SimpleGameModel
This Class contains all the components of the Model of the Game. It is the Class tha receives direct orders from the RemoteServer and which is in charge of beginning almost every process that modifies the Model of the Game. Have a look at MyShelfie RuleBook for further information
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • GameModel

      public GameModel()
      This method creates an instance of GameModel. It also creates a new instance of GameBoard effectively binding the GameModel to the GameBoard which is its main component.

  • Method Details

    • getMatchWinner

      public String getMatchWinner()
      Returns:
      a String containing the nickname of the Player that has won the ongoing match

    • resetEndgame

      public void resetEndgame()
      Sets the variable endGame to false. For testing purposes only.

    • getEndGame

      public boolean getEndGame()
      Returns:
      true if the current match has ended, false otherwise

    • setEndGame

      public void setEndGame()
      Sets the variable endGame to true

    • setMatchWinner

      public void setMatchWinner(Player player)
      Sets the Player that has won the game. The method gets the nickname of the winning Player and sets it into the variable matchWinner.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player that has won the current game

    • setChat

      public void setChat(String Nickname, String chat, String receiver)
      Method that controls the development of the chat and the chat Messages during the current match
      Parameters:
      Nickname - the nickname of the Player that has sent the Message
      chat - the String containing the text of the Message

    • GameTerminator

      public void GameTerminator()
      Sets the variable gameOn causing the termination of the current match

    • getIsGameOn

      public boolean getIsGameOn()
      Returns:
      true if the current match is still ongoing, false otherwise

    • getChairOwner

      public Player getChairOwner()
      Returns:
      the Player that has been chosen as the chairOwner

    • getCurrPlayer

      public Player getCurrPlayer()
      Returns:
      the Player who has currently been determined as currPlayer

    • setMyShelfie

      public void setMyShelfie(GameBoard gameBoard)
      Sets the actual GameBoard of the current match
      Parameters:
      gameBoard - the instance of GameBoard of the current match

    • getPlayersNumber

      public int getPlayersNumber()
      Specified by:
      getPlayersNumber in interface SimpleGameModel
      Returns:
      the number of Players chosen for the current match

    • setPlayersNumber

      public void setPlayersNumber(int playersNumber)
      Sets the number of Players of the current match. The choice is made by the first Player that has joined the match lobby. The playersNumber can only be a number from 2 to 4.
      Parameters:
      playersNumber - the number of Players chosen for the current match

    • setCurrPlayer

      public void setCurrPlayer(Player currPlayer)
      Sets the Player that has become currPlayer The selection is done automatically starting from the chairOwner and following the order of the Players in the ArrayList playersInGame.
      Parameters:
      currPlayer - the Player which has to become currPlayer

    • setChairOwner

      public void setChairOwner(Player player)
      Sets the Player that has become chairOwner. This selection is made only once at random, at the beginning of the match, and is crucial to determine the order of the turns of the Players during the match and the gameWinner at the end of the match.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player which has to become chairOwner

    • getPlayersInGame

      public ArrayList<Player> getPlayersInGame()
      Specified by:
      getPlayersInGame in interface SimpleGameModel
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all the Players in the current match

    • setPlayersInGame

      public void setPlayersInGame(Player newPlayer)
      Adds a new Player to the ArrayList containing all the Players of the current match
      Parameters:
      newPlayer - the Player to add

    • getMyShelfie

      public GameBoard getMyShelfie()
      Returns:
      the GameBoard of the current match

    • isNicknameAvailable

      public boolean isNicknameAvailable(String nickname)
      This method checks whether the nickname, specified by a Player during the login phase, is unique, and thus can be accepted, or not.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname whose univocity needs to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the nickname in unique, false otherwise
